content: **knitted jumper in drops babymerino the piece is worked top down with raglan double neck and cables sizes s - xxxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern bm-102 yarn group a ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **materials ** drops baby merino from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 350-400-450-500-550-600 g colour 50 sage green needles drops circular needle size 3 mm length 40 cm and 80 cm drops circular needle size 2 5 mm length 40 cm and 80 cm drops double pointed needles size 3 mm drops double pointed needles size 2 5 mm drops cable needle the technique magic loop can be used you then only need circular needle of 80 cm in each size **knitting gauge** 26 stitches in width and 34 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
